pageContext.claim: “Clinton Foundation donations drop 42% - which shows that they illegally played the power game. They monetized their political influence through the Foundation. “During her tenure the State Department was put in the service of the Clinton Foundation.”  Andrew McCarthy”
pageContext.analysis: Donations to the Clinton Foundation did fall significantly in 2017, but Trump is pointing to false causation. There are a number of possible reasons fundraising declined that don't include illegal activity.
